column2: California BanCorp is a holding company, which engages in the provision of banking and financial solutions. The company is headquartered in Oakland, California. The Company, through its wholly-owned subsidiary, California Bank of Commerce (the Bank), offers a range of commercial banking services to businesses and professionals located throughout Northern California. The Bank is focused on business banking. Its services include financing, treasury management, international banking and client remote assistance. The Bank offers a range of commercial financing solutions, which includes business financing and commercial real estate and construction. Business financing solutions include lines of credit, capital equipment and mergers and acquisitions: ownership transition. Commercial real estate and construction solutions include owner occupied real estate, investor real estate, equity lines and loans, and construction financing. Its treasury management solutions include receivables, payables, information reporting and liquidity management and online and mobile banking.
